channel.title: SoftMatter on Modulhandbuch Physik/Astronomie der Universität Bonn
channel.description: Recent content in SoftMatter on Modulhandbuch Physik/Astronomie der Universität Bonn

item.title: SoftMatter
item.description: Statistical physics of soft matter and biomolecules (T/A) - SoftMatter Course Statistical physics of soft matter and biomolecules (T/A) Course No. SoftMatter Category Type Language Teaching hours CP Semester Elective Lecture with exercises English 4+2 8 ST Requirements for Participation: Preparation: Advanced statistical mechanics Form of Testing and Examination: Oral examination Length of Course: 1 semester Aims of the Course: Understanding the molecular structure and mesoscopic properties of various types of soft matter systems, in particular with regard to their role in living cells.
